text: Guizbangɨra, ia bizir kɨ irebamɨn ganizibar gun na mɨkemeghan koghɨva, ia bar osɨmtɨzir magh gariba iniam. Kɨ fo, ia bar navir vamɨra inigha ghaze, ia na gifar mangɨtɨ kɨ uan nɨghnɨzim otevkɨnigham. Kamaghɨn, ia irebar kamɨn gun na mɨkɨm, eghtɨ kɨ fogham, ia uaghan an mɨngarim sara na mɨkemegh.”
